p: This study used two strains of CHIKV East/Central/South African (ECSA) genotype: CHIKV-122508 (SGEHICHID122508, Accession No.: FJ445502.2) and CHIKV-0708 (Singapore/07/2008). CHIKV-122508 was obtained from the Environmental Health Institute (EHI), National Environment Agency (NEA), Singapore. CHIKV-0708 was obtained from A/P Raymond Lin (National Public Health Laboratory, Ministry of Health, Singapore). CHIKV-122508 was propagated in C6/36 cells, while CHIKV-0708 was propagated in BHK21 cells.
